name: Babushka
description:
Babushka is a game set in the vast and rugged Russian Taiga. You have to somehow find your way across three different levels by solving some puzzles along the way.

PS: The game is still a work in progress so cool it with the haterade.


Credits

  • Arendse Løvind
  • Carolina Bermejo
  • Frederik Skytte
  • Leonard Maxim
  • Liva Stubbe
  • Marco Camargo
  • Radu Furnea
  • Franceso Ruger Sedda
